sentences.en: "Shall I put him in a box for you?"the saleslady asked.
sentences.cn: “我帮你把他放到盒子里，好吗？” 女售货员问道。

sentences.en: SALESLADY? Alright, how about a twenty - four - inch Toshiba?
sentences.cn: 女销售员?好吧, 那这一台24?级? サ 脑趺囱?

sentences.en: She found a job as a saleslady at the Ludwig-Baumann furniture store in the Bronx and was able to hold it through the Depression.
sentences.cn: 她在布朗克斯区的路德维格-鲍曼家具店找了份售货员的工作，并且靠这份工作度过了整个大萧条时期。

sentences.en: They were shocked when the saleslady punched up the cost.
sentences.cn: 当售货员打出价钱时他们大吃一惊.

words.tran_cn: 销售的，售货的；有关销售的
[贸易] 女售货员；[贸易] 女店员
